question: My neuroloigist told me that the calcium deposits on my brain are physiological, does that meen that this is just a normal thing to happen?  He said they were in 2 different areas, one being the basal ganglia and the other I cannot remember.  How do calium deposits happen?  I'm a 21yr old female.  I have also have peripheral and autonomic nueropathy from diabetes could this have anything to do with it?
title: Physiological calcium deposits
